api

Class Task<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Task<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadyTask, SuccessorTask

    public abstract class Task<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Task is a data structure containing a task to be executed by Computer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean isSpaceRunnable()
        Check if the Task is Space Runnable.
        Returns:
        True if it can be executed directly within the Space. False otherwise.

      • setSpaceRunnable
